prompt_message.content: What is the smallest number that when divided by 2,3,4,5 and 6 always leaves a remainder of 1?
What is the sum of all two-digit numbers that are both perfect squares and multiples of 3?
What's the largest three-digit palindrome number that's divisible by 11?
If you stack cubes in a pyramid where each layer is a square and the top layer is 1x1, and you use exactly 30 cubes total, how many layers does the pyramid have?
In a 3x3 grid of points, how many different squares can you make by connecting the points (squares of any size, but must be square)?
If you fold a rectangular piece of paper in half lengthwise, then in half widthwise, then cut off one corner, how many holes will appear when you unfold it?
Complete this analogy: Odometer is to distance as clock is to ___
Complete: Caterpillar is to butterfly as tadpole is to ___
Complete: Second is to minute as minute is to ___
What comes next in the sequence: 2,6,12,20,30,___
What number comes next: 1,1,2,3,5,8,13,___
What comes next in the sequence: 1,4,9,16,25,___
What 5-letter word becomes shorter when you add two letters to it?
What has a head and a tail but no body?
What word in English is always spelled incorrectly?
If all A are B, and all B are C, and this is not C, what can you conclude about it being A?
If all squares are rectangles, and this shape is not a rectangle, can it be a square? Answer yes or no.
If all mammals are animals, and all dogs are mammals, is every animal a dog? Answer yes or no.
If you roll a fair six-sided die twice, what's the probability (as a percentage rounded to the nearest whole number) of getting a sum of 7?
In a standard deck of 52 cards, what's the probability (as a percentage rounded to the nearest whole number) of drawing a red ace?
If you flip three fair coins, what's the probability (as a percentage rounded to the nearest whole number) of getting exactly two heads?
How many different ways can you arrange the letters in 'BOOK'?
In how many ways can you arrange 3 identical red balls and 2 identical blue balls in a row?
How many different 4-digit numbers can be formed using the digits 1,1,2,2?
How many triangles are there in a regular hexagon (including all possible triangles formed by its vertices)?
If you have 9 coins and need to identify one fake coin that weighs less than the others using a balance scale, what is the minimum number of weighings needed to guarantee finding it?
What's the minimum number of straight cuts needed to divide a circular cake into 8 equal pieces?
If a pendulum's length is doubled, by what factor does its period (time for one complete swing) increase? Express as a decimal with 1 decimal place.
If you mix 100ml of water at 20°C with 100ml of water at 40°C in an insulated container, what will be the final temperature in Celsius?
A ball is thrown straight up with an initial velocity of 20 m/s. How many seconds will it take to reach its maximum height? (Use g=10 m/s² and ignore air resistance)
